text: "I Stay Away" is a 1994 song by Alice in Chains and is the second single from their extended play Jar of Flies. It went to number 10 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart and was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1995. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Acoustic rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: I Stay Away
